mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, recv_address, recv_name, recv_phone, total_price, start_time, end_time, status, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvAddress}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{totalPrice}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
